author: Matt Bassil
description:
What are the best MTG Arena decks? Grinding up Magic: The Gathering Arena’s Standard ladder is tough,  so there's no shame in looking up a tournament-winning deck. This guide tracks the best MTGA decks every month, based on the latest tournament results.

Continue reading Best MTG Arena decks September 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Best MTG Arena decks September 2025

author: Timothy Linward
description:
With Hollow Knight’s long awaited sequel Silksong due to release this very week, my thoughts have turned to that magical original platformer. Wouldn’t it be neat to create a character like the Vessel, Hollow Knight’s enigmatic bug hero, to play as in Dungeons and Dragons? Obviously yes - so I've created a custom (and totally unofficial) Vessel species for DnD 5e.

Continue reading Meet The Vessel, a Hollow Knight inspired species for bug themed DnD adventures
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide<
title: Meet The Vessel, a Hollow Knight inspired species for bug themed DnD adventures

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Secluded Springs has arrived, and just like everyone else I’m scrambling to collect the key cards and figure out the best decks. Though after the first week it seems like there’s only one card making it in the big leagues, this Pokémon Pocket set has plenty of interesting options to try out. Here are some of the strongest options - cards that we think have potential now and further down the line.

Continue reading The 7 best cards in Pokémon Pocket's Secluded Springs set
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: The 7 best cards in Pokémon Pocket's Secluded Springs set

author: Alex Evans
description:
One DnD is the early codename used for the updated set of Dungeons and Dragons rules, released across three books over 2024 and early 2025. With lots of rules tweaks and improvements like buffs to weaker classes and stronger monsters, it's not quite a new edition - hence many fans labeling it 'DnD 5.5e' rather than going the whole hog and saying DnD 6e - but it is the biggest change to the tabletop RPG in a decade.

Continue reading What is One DnD?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: What is One DnD?

author: Mollie Russell
description:
A DnD level up is a character's reward for slaying enough monsters or completing a pivotal quest. Each brings new class abilities, spells, or even stat changes, so no two are the same. If you need a refresher on how to level up in DnD, this guide is here to help. We’ll look at the official rules first, and then we’ll use years of 5e experience to translate this into practical and approachable steps.

Continue reading DnD level ups explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD level ups explained

author: Alex Evans
description:
How many Pokémon are there? If you've lost track over the years, you're not alone - after nine full generations, the total has ballooned from the original 151 into quadruple figures, and that's not even including regional variants, mega-evolutions, and alternate forms. Luckily, Wargamer's keeping track for you - read on for the full total, broken down by generation.

Continue reading How many Pokémon are there? Full list in 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: How many Pokémon are there? Full list in 2025

author: Matt Bassil
description:
It’s started! The Magic: The Gathering event I am most excited about for this year. I’m talking, of course, about spoiler season for the Arena-exclusive Spider-Man cards.

author: Alex Evans
description:
Which new board games should you consider adding to your collection in 2025 - and which upcoming board games should you mark on your calendar? In this tabletop golden age of ours, truckfuls of shiny board gaming jewels hit the internet every week - so we're creating this up to date shortlist of hot new releases to consider for your next game night. We'll also call out the games coming out later this year that should be firmly on your radar screen.

Continue reading New board games and upcoming releases - September 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: New board games and upcoming releases - September 2025

author: Mollie Russell
description:
What cards are on the YuGiOh Master Duel banlist? Master Duel introduced a new way to play the YuGiOh TCG in 2022, and a new list of Forbidden, Limited, and Semi Limited Master Duel cards quickly followed. With digital Yugioh expanding all the time, it needs its own (quite frequent) card bans to fix what gets broken. We track the changes in this guide, so you know the latest bans with minimal fuss.

Continue reading YuGiOh Master Duel Banlist - September 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Yugioh banlist, Most expensive Yugioh cards, Yugioh Master Duel meta decks
title: YuGiOh Master Duel Banlist - September 2025

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Orloj: The Prague Astronomical Clock, a hotly anticipated board game from Spanish publisher Perro Loko Games, will be available in English from Q1 2026. This was confirmed by fellow tabletop publisher Devir Games, who will launch Orloj in English-speaking regions like the US and Canada, in a BoardGameGeek forum post on September 1.

Continue reading One of 2025's most hyped board games gets a release date in English
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best board games for adults, Best strategy board games
title: One of 2025's most hyped board games gets a release date in English

author: Will Freeman
description:
What are the biggest Lego sets ever made? From conversation-starting display pieces to towering monuments, this up-to-date guide tracks the biggest Legos of them all – namely the Lego sets with the most pieces. We can help you find rare behemoths to add to your collection, and we also list the newest additions to Lego’s giant hall of fame.

For clarity, we’re measuring a Lego set’s size by the number of pieces it contains, not merely its physical dimensions. Unsurprisingly, these ultra-large sets also include some of the most expensive Lego sets on the market - but size is no guarantee of quality: if you want our all time favorites, try our guide to the best Lego sets instead.

Continue reading The 34 biggest Lego sets ever made, as of September 2025<
title: The 34 biggest Lego sets ever made, as of September 2025

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Biofactory is an upcoming indie game in the factory building genre that’s hoping to distinguish itself with upsettingly moist and organic aesthetics. Rather than connecting processors, power plants, and conveyor belts, in Biofactory you’ll be stringing together stomachs, hearts, and digestive tracts, as if you were wiring up the innards of a Tyranid bioship from Warhammer 40,000.

Continue reading This slimy indie game is what you'd get if Warhammer 40k Tyranids made Factorio
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games,
title: This slimy indie game is what you'd get if Warhammer 40k Tyranids made Factorio

author: Alex Evans
description:
What cards are on the Yugioh banlist? Konami's official ban list is updated every few months and includes all banned Yugioh cards in the game right now. These cards are made Forbidden, Limited, or Semi Limited to restrict their use and keep the game fair, fun, and balanced. To help you keep your beloved tournament decks legal, we regularly check for Konami's newest card bans and unbans in order to track the full list in this guide.

Continue reading Yugioh banlist - September 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Yugioh banlist, Most expensive Yugioh cards, Yugioh Master Duel meta decks
title: Yugioh banlist - September 2025
